Question
========
Two groups of adolescents differ in their average number of correct answers on a memory test. However, when corrected for reaction time, the groups do not appear to differ. There are:

Answerlist
----------
* A suppressor effect of the covariate.
* A spurious effect of the covariate.
* An inverse effect by the covariate.
* No effect of the covariate.
